titles.title: O Lord you've done great things,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord you've done great things,
And I will praise You,
I will extol You and magnify Your name. (x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will sing praises unto You and remember Your goodness,
My past is forgiven and now I have life;
You crown me with steadfast love and tender mercies,
I'll do Your will and bless You, O Lord.
